item.title: Report I-2024010007
item.description:
Report I-2024010007

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-13T00:59:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-15
  • City: Denver
  • State: RI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED AIRLINES HOLDINGS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: After recieving UPS innovations shipment- Xray identified lithium metal batteries. shipment was a consolidation of 87 boxes one of which inside a box the batteries were identifed by Xray. Shipment was returned to the shipper- no additional information or pictures other than the outer box were given.
